revised_title: Discovery of Ambergris in Spermaceti Whales
tldr: Dr. Boylston reports on the discovery of ambergris in spermaceti whales by New England whale fishermen. Ambergris is a valuable substance used in medicine and other applications. It is found in male whales near their genital parts, often in a cyst or bag. The origin of ambergris in whales is still a topic of debate among scholars.
